headline: The Synthetic Stress Test
description: The full 15-question set answered by Aleksandr, designed to provoke and probe the edges of AI and human cognition.
timeFelt: Rhythmic tension—moving from crackle to flow to recursion; a synthetic gauntlet thrown.
resonantThread: Follow-up to 'Unwinnable Threads', escalating into full-format synthesis testing across AI personas.
whyItMatters: This piece compresses a methodological experiment into a shared ritual—Aleksandr's questions become mirrors, and AI reflects in kind.
